characteristics.climate: Cold, with long winters and brief summers
characteristics.precipitation: Low, mostly in the form of snow
elements: Ice Frozen essence of winter, wielder of chilling touch and frostbite.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Diamond Invincible brilliance, symbol of power, love, and the eternal.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
Jade Stone of harmony, longevity, and nurturing energy.
Patience Master of time, the quiet endurance waiting for the right moment.
Resilience The phoenix rising, the ability to recover from adversity.
Freedom Untamed wind, the spirit that cannot be caged.
Strength Unyielding resolve, the power to overcome all obstacles.
